abstract: Great Plains Energy has agreed to buy the crosstown utility operator Aquila for about $1.7 billion.
snippet: Great Plains Energy has agreed to buy the crosstown utility operator Aquila for about $1.7 billion.
lead_paragraph: Great Plains Energy, the owner of Kansas City Power and Light, has agreed to buy the crosstown utility operator Aquila for about $1.7 billion to try to gain the scale needed to reduce costs and expand its electricity system.

headline.main: Utility in Kansas City Buys Crosstown Rival
headline.print_headline: Utility in Kansas City Buys Crosstown Rival
